name: Stellar Engine
short_description: A hyper-realistic 3D model of a futuristic engine, perfect for sci-fi scenes and detailed mechanical renders.

name: Ancient Golem
short_description: A game-ready, low-poly golem character with intricate rock textures and mystical engravings. Fully rigged for animation.

name: Orbital Station X7
short_description: A sprawling, modular space station kitbash set. Create endless orbital habitats for your universe.

name: Cyberpunk Street Asset Pack
short_description: A comprehensive collection of neon signs, street props, and modular building facades for creating vibrant cyberpunk environments.

name: Ice Wyvern
short_description: A majestic ice wyvern model with detailed scales, 4K textures, and a full set of animations including flight and attack cycles.
